Herman Foster

  1. Foster Name: Herman Herbert
  2. Foster Family: Samuel Birdsall
  3. Location of Family: Rock Creek community near Greenwood, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Greenwood, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 9
  7. Date of Birth: 1895, New York City, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1946-01-28, Hot Springs, SD
  9. Gender: male
  10. Notes: After death of the Samuel Birdsalls lived with the A. R. Birdsalls.
  11. Source: Greenwood newspaper, November 1903; Plattsmouth Journal, 11 February 1946.
